entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
